title: COVID Infection Won’t Slow Down Mads Pedersen’s Tour de France Triple Threat: ‘The Speed is Still There’
content:
A leaner, trimmer version of Mads Pedersen slots into pole position for the yellow jersey sweepstakes in Saturday's hilly opening stage: 'It makes no sense not to try.'

Read the full article at COVID Infection Won’t Slow Down Mads Pedersen’s Tour de France Triple Threat: ‘The Speed is Still There’ on Velo.
